As a consultant, my role is to develop business to business relationships for our state of the art educational programs. Upon joining Tecademics last year as a consultant to the Chairman I have been focused on building large scale relationships for Tecademics. I also have built two new courses, “Certified Power Sellers”, which teaches entrepreneurs how to “Grow, Build, and Flip” eCommerce stores and “10x Digital Marketing for Financial Advisors” being held in October, 2017 in Scottsdale, AZ. Tecademics provides Education for Entrepreneurs - Instructing students from around the world how to build their own business online. Taught by Industry leading practitioners using the latest digital marketing strategies, our unique approach to education is built on the well proven foundation of Instructional System Design (ISD) while incorporating the most up to date techniques of Micro-Learning. Our scientifically- engineered syllabus, designed and developed by PhD curriculum experts is specifically built for the rapid retention of information. Tecademics is your gateway to a complete accelerated learning solution.

Geocentric Media through it's subsidiary Butts in Seats Marketing  has the exclusive rights to market and sell the Privileges | American Express Travel Savings Card. American Express is one of the Top 25 most respected brands in the world, and when you align yourself through co-branding with Privileges | American Express Travel , you’ll also be able to use the Privileges | American Express Travel branding in your marketing, which leverages credibility and brand trust for your specific product/offer/service. We are looking for businesses who want to set themselves apart from the competition by using these Privileges | American Express Travel Savings Cards (or Codes) as an incentive or a reward to their prospects, clients or employees. Geocentric Media is an online advertising media and marketing venture established to represent a network of 850 "City".com brands, both domestically and internationally. Our cities range in size from small upscale communities to large metropolitan areas. Geocentric Media manages all of the sales, marketing, and advertising functions across the network of sites and procures both national and local partnerships.
Co-Founder | Head of Sales and Business Development
Marketing 3.0 | LocalBizClicks | White Hat Digital Marketing

We offer a full range of digital marketing services. Our focus is on the unique needs of YOUR business. We integrate search and social marketing, online advertising, email and content marketing, video production, web development, design and branding into a cohesive, cost-effective strategy focused on delivering bottom-line business results for our clients: specifically focusing on traffic, conversions, and results (sales and list building).Our measurement of success is More Customers to YOU and More Money in YOUR Pocket.

Incline Capital was created to help financial advisors and their clients in both up and down markets. Our main focus is risk management, and we believe our trademarked "Smart Switch Index" is the only of its kind available to non-accredited investors. Put simply, it's built upon the asset allocation and diversification concepts your are already familiar with by adding trend following, creating what we called "Active Asset Allocation".The Incline Fund was started in March of 2009. We increased the funds' assets from $600,000 to $26,000,000. The fund was then sold to Highland Funds (Pyxis Funds) in May of 2011.

One of the most consistent and top-rated wholesalers at ING, an annuities and financial services expert, who built this territory from the ground up.  Left ING in 2009 with close to $1.5 Billion in lifetime sales. Set the record twice for the largest single ticket, the largest daily sales total, and the largest monthly sales total. They all remain to this day...Third team member to achieve $1,000,000,000 in sales - 2006Record for largest case ever sold, $30,000,000 - 2009Top Ten in Sales 1999 - 2008Century Club ($100,000,000 plus annual sales) 1999 - 2008

I highly recommend working with Kurt and hope to do so for many years to come!

summary: My passion is forging new opportunities with clients that fuel their business growth, and drive revenue and profitability. I am a business driver, a connector, and solely focused on results! I spent most of my career in the wholesale financial services industry where I was a nationally recognized as a top performer and expert in the field. I became interested in online marketing while serving as Vice President at ING, riding their wave of online success from 1997-2009. During my time at ING I achieved many awards and $1.5 Billion in lifetime sales. I drive your marketing strategy to help businesses win local and national online traffic. I will ensure that you receive outstanding customer service and a dedicated marketing effort to maximize, your business growth, ROI, and your bottom line. I have built a wide and deep network of relationships in the digital marketing space. To connect please go to kurtohlson.com. I look forward to speaking with you. Expertise•	Marketing Strategy•	Digital Growth Strategy•	Business Development Strategy•	Business Growth and Sales Strategy•	Strategic Opportunities and Entrepreneurship•	Finance, Capital Formation, and Investor Relations•	Internet Marketing/SEO & PPC Expert
name: Kurt Ohlson
